title: Canto: If I Only Had a Heart
description: In the fantastical world of Arcana, tin slaves are forbidden to love, but Canto must defy his slavers and embark on an incredible journey to save the one he loves most.Enslaved for generations, Canto's people once had hearts. Now they have clocks. When slavers damage a little tin girl's clock beyond repair, Canto must brave his strange and fantastic world to bring back her heart. Can he overcome the dangers that await him to save the one he loves?Part fantasy, part adventure, and full of heart, this graphic novel by writer David Booher and artist Drew Zucker is inspired in equal parts by The Wonderful Wizard of Oz and Dark Crystal.
author: David M. Booher
